intro: Epidendrum longihastatum, commonly known as the long-horned epidendrum, is a species of orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its long, slender stems and clusters of fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees in humid tropical environments. Its leaves are elongated and革质, providing structural support and aiding in water retention. Epidendrum longihastatum is appreciated for its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements in cultivation.
